channel.title: mklink on Canyi Chen
channel.description: Recent content in mklink on Canyi Chen

item.title: gohugo & mklink & sed & Typora
item.description: Hard link in windows mklink /d "C:\Users\chencanyi\Desktop\Typora" "D:\Documents\RStudio\ccybnumath.github.io\content\post" mklink /d "C:\Users\chencanyi\Desktop\Typora\images" "C:\Users\chencanyi\Desktop\Typora\images" Typora sed regular expression set ![1565787183436](images/2019-8-14-gohugo-&-mklink-&-sed.assets/1565787183436.png) to ![1565787183436](/images/2019-8-14-gohugo-&-mklink-&-sed.assets/1565787183436.png) find . -type f -name \*.md | grep -f old.file -v |xargs sed -i 's!(images!(/images!g' blogupload.sh cd ./content/post/ find . -type f -name \*.md | grep -f old.file -v |xargs sed -i 's!(images!(/images!g' cd .. cd .. hugo git add . git commit -m "autopush from blogpush" git push cd public git add .
